content: this is a pattern for a small size doily about 9 inches across after blocking made with crochet cotton thread size 10 and 1 5 mm steel hook the skill level is advanced beginner the stitches are simple but you need to read and follow the directions for each round very carefully this pattern is my original design and it cannot be distributed in any form but you have the permission to sell finished items from this pattern video tutorial is available here https //www youtube com/watch v=0poomyob9om
